subject: Hockey, Ice
Relocation of Business
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With the game over and the sun perhaps setting on their time in Glendale, Ariz., the Phoenix Coyotes raised their sticks at midice and saluted the chanting crowd.
snippet: With the game over and the sun perhaps setting on their time in Glendale, Ariz., the Phoenix Coyotes raised their sticks at midice and saluted the chanting crowd.
